scripts.text: The women are setting up the room.
They are shaking hands across the table.
scripts.translation: 그들은 테이블 너머로 악수를 하고 있다.

scripts.text: They're sitting at a table.
They are hanging a sign on the wall.
The woman is looking into a refrigerated display case.
Some merchandise is stacked next to the register.
scripts.translation: 일부 상품이 계산대 옆에 쌓여 있다.

scripts.text: A shopping cart is being loaded with groceries.
The shelves are being rearranged by a worker.
A man is doing some needlework.
A sewing machine is being repaired on the table.
The desk drawers have been left open.
The window blinds are pulled down.
The chairs are arranged around a gathering area.
scripts.translation: 의자들이 모임 장소 주변에 배치되어 있다.

scripts.text: The building overlooks the ocean.
The men are trimming the trees.
A boat is sailing on the water.
The people at the table are looking over menus.
scripts.translation: 테이블에 있는 사람들이 메뉴를 살펴보고 있다.

scripts.text: They are paying the bill at the restaurant.
The table is being set for dinner.
scripts.translation: 저녁 식사를 위해 테이블이 세팅되고 있다.

scripts.text: One of the women is pouring water into a cup.
scripts.translation: 여성 중 한 명이 컵에 물을 붓고 있다.

scripts.text: There is a bicycle with a trailer parked near the entrance.
scripts.translation: 입구 근처에 트레일러가 달린 자전거가 주차되어 있습니다.

scripts.text: The people are sitting on a bench outside the structure.
scripts.translation: 사람들이 구조물 밖에 있는 벤치에 앉아 있습니다.

scripts.text: Some baskets are being loaded onto the back of the vehicle.
scripts.translation: 몇몇 바구니들이 차량 뒤편에 실리고 있습니다.

scripts.text: Two women are entering the building.
A cashier is scanning items for a customer.
The customers are lined up waiting for the store to open.
scripts.translation: 고객들이 가게가 문을 열기를 기다리며 줄을 서 있습니다.

scripts.text: A woman is reaching across the counter to grab a bag.
scripts.translation: 여자가 가방을 잡기 위해 계산대 너머로 손을 뻗고 있습니다.

scripts.text: The employees are stocking the shelves in the grocery store.
scripts.translation: 직원들이 식료품점 선반에 물품을 채우고 있습니다.
